text: Melanie Chisholm (born in Whiston, Cheshire, on 12 January 1974) is an English singer-songwriter and television personality. She is best known as one of the five members of the girl group Spice Girls, where she was nicknamed "Sporty Spice". As a solo artist, she has released four albums and was nominated for a BRIT and ECHO Award and charted at the top of the Billboard Dance Chart in the US in late 2000. == References == Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:English pop musicians Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Merseyside Category:Spice Girls Category:People with anorexia
